page.title: 18THE LANIVET CARNIVAL
page.content:
Mr, Blatchford runs the carnival.Last year the teasurer's caravan belonged to Mr.Rohrs.
There were lots of groups of majorettes who were in competition with one another. We had to book into a tent if we wanted to take part in the fancy dress. After the judging there was the parade.Some people were throwing water balloons about. Others caught the balloons and threw them back!The shop selling second hand goods sold cups of tea for the occasion.Most of the people at the carnival came from Lanivet but some came from Luxulyan and Bodmin.At the end it was time for the announcements of the prize winners.Right at the end some boys were doing B.M.X. stunts on the Green. It was fun.
